title: The Club
description: Journalist Mark Clancy links a series of murders of colleagues and noted celebrities to the Glamour Club, a gentlemanâ€™s establishment in London. Along with colleague Donna Sharkey, they discover the club is a feeder for a mysterious dwelling in Belgravia. Shunned and dissuaded by a number of corrupt and disbelieving officials, the couple decide to infiltrate The Club. They learn of something so incredible and frightening, including a plot to assassinate the future Prime Minister. A story of murder, corruption, perversion, and greed. From the seedy clubs of Soho, to the worldwide playgrounds of the wealthy, this book will captivate you.
author: Anthony Hulse
